title: Publish the application to production

requirements.text: Deploy the current draft version to production on the Internet Computer, making it publicly accessible with a permanent URL
acceptanceCriteria: The application is deployed to the Internet Computer mainnet
A permanent, publicly accessible URL is generated
All frontend pages (Home, Courses, Course Details, About, Enrollment, Fee Payment, Dashboard) are accessible
Backend canister is deployed and accessible to the frontend
All course data (Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, Social Studies) is available in production
Internet Identity authentication works in production
Enrollment and payment features are functional in production

constraints: Preserve all existing functionality during deployment
Ensure backend state is properly initialized with course data
Maintain the existing visual theme and styling
nonGoals: Making any code changes or feature additions
Changing the visual design or theme
